Content.Text:
Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wowzers! There's a huge surprise for ya!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When I got up this morning, all of a sudden both
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> could crawl!
<PAGE>
Man, babies grow up so fast!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who knows what they think they're saying, but
they look like they're havin' loads of fun doing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Augh, they're so CUTE! People always said that
once you have kids, you can't help but go ga-ga
over them. I totally get that now!
<PAGE>
I can't wait to see what kind of people they grow
into.

<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are growing bigger
and stronger by the day! ♪ I always wonder
what new thing they'll learn to do next!

Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Surprising, isn't it.
<PAGE>
It seems like only yesterday they could barely
turn themselves over, but now both <CHILD_NAME_M>
and <CHILD_NAME_W> are crawling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm as surprised as you are. Truly, children grow
up so quickly.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! We adults can't make heads or tails of
what they are saying, but they seem to
understand each other perfectly.
<PAGE>
Just watching them is enough to make all my
worries and fears melt away. I can't wait to see
how they grow and change next.

Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Kinda surprising, huh? I woke up today, and it's
like all of a sudden, these two had figured out
how to crawl.
<PAGE>
It's always a shock just how fast these two keep
growing.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hunh. I've got no idea what they're laughing
about, but they both seem to get what the
other's saying, so it's all right.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Honestly, just watching them makes me feel
good. I can't wait to see what they'll get up to
next.

Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Quite the surprise, isn't it? It seems
these two have suddenly learned how to crawl.
<PAGE>
It never ceases to surprise me how quickly
children grow.
<PAGE>
It feels as though it passes so quickly that one
would miss it if they blinked.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. It seems like they are carrying on a lively
conversation of their own without us.
<PAGE>
Eventually, they'll start learning how to talk, and
from there, to walk... I can hardly wait to watch
them learn.

Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I woke up this morning, these two were
crawling around all over. I'd never seen them do
that before!
<PAGE>
Who knew kids would grow up this fast? I'm
gonna have to keep watching them, just so I
don't miss anything.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hunh. I wonder what they find so funny..
<PAGE>
I never get bored watching them. Seeing them
smile makes it impossible for me not to smile.
<PAGE>
I always wonder what they'll learn or how they'll
grow next. I can't wait to find out.

Maa--ma?
<PAGE>
Mamaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Surprising, isn't it? I was pretty
shocked when I saw them crawling around this
morning, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Both of them must've just figured out how to do
it.
<PAGE>
Man, children really do grow up fast.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mamaaaa! ♪ Ma ma ma ma ma ma maaaa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maa-----mah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! Look at them both laughing. I wonder
what they think is so hilarious. Heck, maybe it's
us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I have no idea what they're saying to each other,
but watching it is enough to coax a smile out of
a stone.
<PAGE>
And hey, all their babbling and gurgling is
teaching them how to talk...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And when they can talk they'll start listening --
or not listening! -- to what we say. I can hardly
wait.

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohohohoho! <MYNAME>, you have the silliest
look on your face right now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Though, truth be told, I was rather surprised
myself when I saw them this morning.
<PAGE>
Whenever did these two learn how to crawl?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They look like they're having such fun. Just
watching them is enough to make me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Laughing and babbling together like this will
teach them how to talk, won't it? I can hardly
wait to see them grow further.

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> can crawl now!
I saw them both crawling around this morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It reminds me of when Mistel was still in
diapers.
<PAGE>
Honestly, children grow so quickly.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohoho! Watching them have so much fun
together makes all our daily worries and
headaches melt away, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
Even though balancing work and parenting is
challenging, times like these make it feel worth
it. I can't wait to see what they'll learn next!

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, total shocker, huh <MYNAME>? I was so
surprised when I saw it this morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Who would've guessed <CHILD_NAME_M> and
<CHILD_NAME_W> would figure out how to crawl this
fast?
<PAGE>
Geez, those babies are growing every day!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohmigosh, they're SO CUTE!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Lately, when I'm at shoots for the children's
show I'm working on, I can't help but think...
<PAGE>
Our kids are both going to grow as big as the
kids on that show, someday. I can't wait to see
that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee! Then maybe they could be on the show
with me. That would be awesome! ♪

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heehee! Did that surprise you? This morning,
both of them had almost learned how to crawl.
<PAGE>
I thought it would be fun if we could surprise
you, so the three of us practiced our crawling all
morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now both of them are crawling like pros, right?
Babies grow up so fast. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They look like they're having such fun. It's like
they're best friends, too. That's great. ♪
<PAGE>
Soon they'll start talking, then walking, and then
getting into all sorts of mischief...
<PAGE>
Knowing that's what's ahead has me so excited!
I can hardly wait to watch them.

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It certainly is surprising, isn't it <MYNAME>? I
was quite shocked when I first saw it this
morning.
<PAGE>
Before I even realized it, they've both grown into
the crawling stage.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now that both have learned how to babble and
laugh, our home will be even more lively than
before.
<PAGE>
I can hardly wait to see what they'll learn to do
next.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, let's keep taking good care of our
children and do our best not to miss anything as
they grow.

Paa--pa?
<PAGE>
Papaaaa?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Baaauu! Eeehee hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I was surprised this morning when I woke up
and saw them both crawling about.
<PAGE>
I know it sounds obvious, but babies are
certainly different than plants. They can grow so
much in a week...no, even in a day.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papaaaa! ♪ Pa pa pa pa pa pah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Gabba buu. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Paa-----pah! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Aha ha ha ha! ♪

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I have no idea what they're laughing about, but
just watching them giggle like that is enough to
make me smile.
<PAGE>
I'd never realized how cute children could be
until we had ours. Now, I'm reminded of it every
day.
<PAGE>
I can hardly wait to see what new behavior
they'll exhibit next!
